name: The Void Club ch.5
description:
WARNING: MATURE CONTENT. This game contains mature themes, strong language, and strong sexual content. Viewer discretion is advised.
Welcome to the Void Club. You are the owner of the nascent sex club and it is your job to recruit women across universes and make them servile to make the Void Club a success for your benefactor. Take advantage of your loyal aide and make choices to acquire talented heroines that you can also take advantage of before putting them to work for the Void Club. Or die in the attempt. The choice is yours how to forcefully recruit these women.
Here's our patreon if you want to support us:
https://www.patreon.com/Thevoidclub
notice: there might be a short loading time after clicking on new game ;)
